data.description: Read Solaris list of mounted devices
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SDS/SVM is Solaris Volume Manager. So it had to be in
    Solaris::Disk, as it manages disk volumes. It further need two other
    modules, which would nicely fit in this hierarchy:
    Solaris::Disk::Mnttab and Solaris::Disk::VTOC.
